pkgmetadata.longdescription: htop is an interactive process viewer for Linux. It aims to be a 'better top': you can scroll the process list vertically and horizontally, and select a process to be killed with the arrow keys instead of by typing its process id.

use.flag: enable sys-apps/hwloc support for CPU affinity
Enable Linux sched_setaffinity() and sched_getaffinity() for affinity support, disables hwloc
Enable per-task IO Stats (taskstats kernel support required)
